roleset.name: rob
roleset.note: MUG-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Close to VNcls cheat-10.6. (from mug.01-v)
MUGGING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Close to VNcls cheat-10.6. (from mugging.01-n)

example.name: mug-v: passive, From BOLT
example.text: I literally do not understand why-3 [those people]-1 did n't just get mugged [*-1]and beaten to death as soon as they started stealing 2 million in student money and then throwing parties with it [*-3].

example.name: mug-v: All args
example.text: Man says bear mugged him for his Italian sandwich

example.name: mugging-n: args 0, 1
example.text: John's mugging Marry in the parking lot left her bereft of twinkies.
